attributes.action: Stop Conner Mcreaddie the overweight 8 year old going into care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its beyond inhumanity to send an 8 year old boy into care, because he's overweight. I wanted to bring this to everyones attention to stop that family being torn apart. The story was in the Daily Mirror 26th february, and it will be featured on "Tonight", with Trever Macdonald on the 26th february, at 8:00pm.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
